type: Security System Maintenance and Preventative, Corrective Maintenance
short_summary: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for repair and preventative maintenance (PM) service on its Physical Security Access Control System for 3851 Fallowfield Road, Nepean, Ontario, K2H 8P9.
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for repair and preventative maintenance (PM) service on its Physical Security Access Control System for 3851 Fallowfield Road, Nepean, Ontario, K2H 8P9. This will include a scheduled preventative maintenance program, and as-and-when needed repairs on an on-call basis. Mandatory Site Visit: All Bidders must attend a site visit.
